attributes.title: not user-friendly at all😡😡😡😡😡😡
attributes.review: no cap people. I’m a liberal and a bernie supporter, but I actually tried using this app after I downloaded it to see what it was all about. it’s actually trash all jokes aside. said it would send an SMS confirmation code, didn’t. said it was my fault for entering a fake number. plus it crashed my phone a few times. if you’re actually a person wanting to use this app I wouldn’t recommend it, clearly whoever developed it didn’t develop it with user friendliness in mind. 0/10 was attacked by a sentient orange wearing a tie as soon as I opened it, an image that will probably haunt my dreams for a while.

attributes.title: gen-z
attributes.review: trump. you are a horrible juman being. you encourage misogyny, racism, homophobia, pedophilia, and so much more. it shocks me how they let people like you get in office. as a part of the tiktok community, i’ll contribute to a video i saw by rating this app one star🧚🏻❤️.

attributes.title: worst app ever😾😾😾 stinky, terrible, no bueno❤️
attributes.review: i downloaded this app expecting trumpet classes (yay 🎺), as i had just gotten my new trumpet and was very excited to use it 😹😸😃😁. unfortunately, this app had deceived me in the worst way possible 🤬😡😤😾🙀. i tried to text the number you are supposed to for trumpet support but instead they stole all of my life savings (1 trillion 🙀🙄😛) but also stole every social security number ✨e v e r✨. I am so utterly disgusted and enraged by this app and demand it be removed from the app store 💅🏼😼🙊e n t i r e l y💅🏼😼🙊. for you reading this, i have good news. the app tiktok has a fabulous page @trumpet_luvers for learning new songs. I highly recommend!!!!!! 😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁☺️😁☺️😗😉😌😊🥰🤓😋🥳😝😉😋🤪🤪🤣🤣🤣😎😜😜😜😜😜😜😜😜😜

attributes.title: HOW I ALMOST HAD DIAHREAR.
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app because I love our orange goddess. Until, I suddenly pooped large amounts of poop once I saw his orange face. I couldn’t handle myself. But this app is BAD! IT GAVE MY POOP AND U SHOULDNT HAVE IT TOO. Spread the awareness. #TRUMPGIVEZDIAHREA❤️

attributes.title: This app sucks😡
attributes.review: For this trump 2020 app it asks for my phone number now I’m not single I can’t just give my phone number to anyone who asks for is so I immediately deleted the app I mean that was just plan out disrespectful I do not tolerate this. So I am highly disappointed.
